scripts.trigger-ci: git commit --allow-empty -m "trigger CI workflows for testing" && git push
scripts.test: docker compose run --remove-orphans test-runner npx playwright test
scripts.test:headed: docker compose run --remove-orphans test-runner npx playwright test --headed
scripts.test:debug: docker compose run --remove-orphans test-runner npx playwright test --debug
scripts.test:chrome: docker compose run --remove-orphans test-runner npx playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.test:sanity: docker compose run --remove-orphans test-runner sh -c 'TEST_TAGS="@sanity" npx playwright test'
scripts.test:regression: docker compose run --remove-orphans test-runner sh -c 'TEST_TAGS="@regression" npx playwright test'
scripts.test:sanity:chrome: docker compose run --remove-orphans test-runner sh -c 'TEST_TAGS="@sanity" npx playwright test --project=chromium'
scripts.test:regression:chrome: docker compose run --remove-orphans test-runner sh -c 'TEST_TAGS="@regression" npx playwright test --project=chromium'
